content.question: If <math alttext="f of x, equals arc sine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>arcsin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the limit as x approaches one half, of, the fraction with numerator f of x, minus, f of one half, and denominator x minus one half, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> is

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2, and denominator the square root of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>
